_comment: Test fixture for a valid v0.2.0 major release (v0 major bump). Tests the release workflow's ability to create a major patch release during the v0 development phase. Git state required: No existing tag v0.2.1, existing tag v0.2.1, main branch checked out. Expected outcome: Workflow should validate version format, create GitHub release with tag v0.2.0, update major tag v0 to point to v0.2.0, generate release notes. Used in the rollback-failed-release test scenario to validate manual release triggering when the automatic release trigger fails.
